title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Engaging in conversations with loved ones of all ages brings a smile to your face today. You cant get enough of those who make your heart pump faster while the voracious Taurus Moon opposes Mercury and Venus in passionate Scorpio. But trying to sample a bit of everyone, like a social buffet, may not go as well as you expect. You could end up oversaturated with too much emotion from interacting with such a diverse array of people. Or some folks might feel cheated on their one-on-one time with you. Narrow your range of enjoyment and dig in deeply with a select few. Seek quality over quantity for the best connection. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
